name: The Horror Night Room Escape
description:
Welcome to The Horror Night Room Escape, the scariest game of this genre! This game isn’t for scaredy-cats. It's only for those brave players who are never afraid because only if you have nerves of steel and keep calm you will be able to solve all the mysteries.
You have just broken into the haunted asylum at night. It’s huge and built in the shape of a maze that you cannot exit unless you find all the clues and keys. You must escape, but there’s something chasing after you! You can almost feel its breath upon your neck.
RUN FAST!!!!!

Discover terrifying and scary creatures in each room. Remember, you can hide in different corners of the maze or behind different objects, but don’t let it see you!

Game features:
- Daily Rewards.
- Multiple unlockable rooms.
- Realistic scary environment.
- Realistic ghost atmosphere animation.
- Consult a hand-drawn map to plan your next move.
- Custom Difficulty.

Will you escape the asylum? Download The Horror Night Room Escape for Free! And... play now!
